tasks.label: Start Supabase
args: [ -n "$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN" ] && supabase login --token "$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN" || (echo "SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN vazio" && exit 1); [ -n "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID" ] && supabase link --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID" || (echo "SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID vazio" && exit 1)
